import illustrationImg from '../images/illustration.svg' import logoImg from '../images/logo.svg' import '.././styles/auth.scss' import { Button } from '../components/Button' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext } from 'react' import { TestContext } from '../App' export function NewRoom(){ const {value, setValue} = useContext(TestContext) return(
Crie salas de Q&A ao-vivo
